column1: Let Philshine usher in a fantastic new year as he brings you all the best music of the 70s
column3: 90s and today- only on South Devon Sound!#Sat

column1: Get ready now for some fun
column3: and the best songs that children's entertainment has to offer in KidsZone- on the air now until 10am!#Sat

column1: South Devon Saturday on the air until 1pm with the soundtrack to your weekend- why not check out the games on our website while you listen?#Sat
Tune in now to Everything Eighties and reminisce on years gone by with some classic tunes of the era here on South Devon Sound!#Sat
Dust off that air guitar and rock out to your first weekend of the year with the Saturday Afternoon Radio Show- on the air now until 5pm!#Sat
Celebrate the new year by travelling to the birthplace of man with Africa Calling on South Devon Sound- you'll be back at home by 7pm! ;-)#Sat

column1: Philshine is back again for another edition of his weekend breakfast show- bringing you some of the best music around in his unique style.#Sun
South Devon Sunday on the air now until 1pm with the soundtrack to your South Devon weekend- only here on South Devon Sound!#Sun
The old songs get an outing as we put some remakes through their paces in Classic Remakes until 3pm. Up next: The Sunday 70s Show!#Sun
Join us now for the first Sunday 70s Show of the year as we take you back in time to the flamboyant and lively music of the 70s.#Sun
Country music at it's finest here on South Devon Sound now as Gone Country takes over for the next 2 hours- Stetsons and boots are optional...#Sun
All the best songs of stage and screen now on the air as we take our seats for another Musical Memories here on South Devon Sound.#Sun
Celebrate the end of your romantic New Year weekend by joining us in The Love Zone for the best and most powerful love songs ever!#Sun
South Devon by Night here now to ease you into a blissful sleep in preparation for the week ahead; we'll be back from 6am tomorrow.#Sun

column3: and mellow tunes to help you drift off to sleep.#Wed
